pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Isotope Labeling for Metabolomics Analysis // An efficient approach for fishing out the dual (or multiple) isotope labeled analytes using dual labeling of metabolites for metabolome analysis (DLEMMA) approach, described in Liron (2018) doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.8b01644, and Dong (2019) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btz092.
